>
[Bark and Tendril](/Feats.aspx?ID=4504) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Leshy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=225" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 69 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You wield primal magic. You can cast [entangling flora](/Spells.aspx?ID=103) and [oaken resilience](/Spells.aspx?ID=20) as 2nd-rank primal [innate spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=279) once per day each.
name: Bark and Tendril
